description: Alpine sends, backcountry powder hunts, and summit snags—the Kor Stasis Hooded Jacket keeps our microclimate feeling just right through it all. Constructed with breathable, movement-freeing materials, this layer traps heat when we're standing still, pumps out the excess when we're on the move, and never holds us back.
name: Mountain Hardwear Kor Stasis Jacket - Mens
